title: pvp.net patcher kernel has stopped working
body:
pls some1 help me
I tryed everything qq

replies.body: The kernel error can be caused by security configuration that might be blocking the patcher from launching or scanning game files.  The steps in the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide should help restore access.  Let me know if you have any questions!
